p: HMPV was discovered in 2001 after isolation from dozens of young children in the Netherlands [ 1]. Soon after its initial identification, HMPV was found globally as an etiological agent of respiratory infections in young children and elderly adults [ 20, 21, 22, 23]. In temperate climates, HMPV epidemics tend to occur in winter and spring while in tropical climates, they are more sporadic [ 24, 25, 26, 27, 28].
